name: ucass-datashare
description: UCASS DataShare Platform - 社科大数据分享平台

scripts.dev: concurrently "bun --filter web-frontend dev" "bun --filter api-backend dev" "bun --filter python-service dev"
scripts.build: bun --filter web-frontend build && bun --filter api-backend build
scripts.start: concurrently "bun --filter web-frontend start" "bun --filter api-backend start" "bun --filter python-service start"
